sourcing.instructions: B (Boron powder) from chemical supply companies; Co (Cobalt powder) from metal suppliers; Ni (Nickel powder) from metal suppliers; Tm (Thulium powder) from chemical supply companies; Y (Yttrium powder) from chemical supply companies.
steps: B (Boron powder) from chemical supply companies; Co (Cobalt powder) from metal suppliers; Ni (Nickel powder) from metal suppliers; Tm (Thulium powder) from chemical supply companies; Y (Yttrium powder) from chemical supply companies.
1. Weigh each ingredient using an analytical balance for precision.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh each ingredient using an analytical balance for precision.

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally (approximately 6-8 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally (approximately 6-8 hours).

steps: 1. Remove the solid sample from the mold carefully.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the solid sample from the mold carefully.
